Project.description: Root node for the Software Requirements Specification.

Story.description: A specific user story capturing a functional requirement.
Story.body: The user story text (As a <role>, I want <feature>, so that <benefit>).

Process.description: The name of a specific internal/core process that must be implemented for the application to work. A process connects together User stories, Data Structures, internal and external endpoints and User Controls in one unit.
Process.body: The whole description of the process including Name, how should it be implemented (including processes to be completed, input, output, events it responds to, entities and components involved, technologies used)

Requirement.description: A specific non-functional requirement or constraint.
Requirement.body: Details of the requirement (e.g., performance target, safety constraint, reliability, security, compliance).

Component.description: The Name of a specific Software Component (internal class component, Database, system layer, external service/server) that must exists for Core Processes and User Stories to be implemented. The component must be referred by name.
Component.body: The description of the Component, its role and responsibilities, the core processes and user stories it is connected with, as well as any Data structore, internal/external API it manages/uses and the technologies used for the implementation.

DataModel.description: The Name of a specific domain data structure or model used by the system.
DataModel.body: The formal definition of the data model (e.g., JSON schema, TypeScript interface, protobuf message, SQL table).

Endpoint.description: The Name of a specific logical API endpoint exposed by the system.
Endpoint.body: Details of the endpoint including method, path or operation name, request/response contracts, auth, and error semantics.

Interface.description: The Name of a specific external or hardware interface the system interacts with.
Interface.body: Protocol details, commands, timing, transport characteristics, and data exchanged.

Component.description: The Name of a specific UI component, screen, or interactive element.
Component.body: Description of the component, its props/inputs, state, behavior, events and interaction patterns.

Tech.description: The Name of a Specific Technology used in the project
Tech.body: Specific Description of how the technology is it gonna be used in the project
